title: Utility Types
explanation: TypeScript provides built-in utility types that transform existing types. These save time and make code more maintainable.

codeBlocks.title: Partial, Required, Readonly
Pick, Omit
Record
ReturnType, Parameters
Exclude, Extract, NonNullable

tip: Utility types help you transform and manipulate types without duplication. Use Partial for update functions, Pick for API responses, and Record for dictionaries.
